curl -X POST "http://localhost:18080/realms/my_realm/protocol/openid-connect/token" \
--header "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded" \
--data-urlencode "grant_type=password" \
--data-urlencode "client_id=my_client" \
--data-urlencode "client_secret=wZZylp4oco6oxF3DDDmCdpHUWcp1DTjq" \
--data-urlencode "username=admin" \
--data-urlencode "password=1"


curl -X GET "http://localhost:8000/test/permitAll"
